text:
2 contributors have submitted pull requests with updates to the extension. Both of these updates will make it into future versions of the extension. There are still more #hacktoberfest and “good first issue” tasks if you’re interested. to put it into perspective, your efforts will help 343+ HubSpot Developers. (343 is the current total of users using the extension both beta and stable).

If you have any one of these skills:
• Javascript
• CSS
• HTML

We have tasks we could use help on.

If you speak german or japanese i have a hacktoberfest task for you, search the language you speak in the repos issues and youll see those.
No code editing necessary just simply translating text.
